bart.summary: On Monday, church bells rang out across the world to mark the death of Pope Francis at the age of 88. Jason Horowitz talks with Michael Babaro about the Pope's push to change the church, his bitter clashes with traditionalists, and what his papacy ultimately means to the world's 1.4 billion Catholics. It's Tuesday, April 22. This is the Daily.

t5.summary: I'm Rome Birocheev, Jason Horowitz. It's Tuesday, April 22. Jason, good evening. I know it's late there and that it's been a long day for you. I know from the messages we've been exchanging today that you spent some time in St. Peter's Square where mourners are now gathered. Can you just describe that scene? Sure. I know from the messages we've been exchanging today that you spent some time in St. Peter's

bart.summary: In recent weeks, the Trump administration has deported hundreds of Venezuelan migrants by quickly labeling them as gang members and foreign enemies. As a result, very little has been known about who these men are or how they were targeted by immigration officials. Today, my colleague Julie Turquoise explains who was actually on those planes and the secretive process that led to their deportations.

t5.summary: In recent weeks, the Trump administration has deported hundreds of Venezuelan migrants by quickly labeling them as gang members and foreign enemies . Until now, very little has been known about who these men are or how they were targeted by immigration officials . Until now, my colleague Julie Turquoise explains who was actually on those planes and the secretive process that led to their deportations .

bart.summary: A few days ago, Deely producer Jessica Chung traveled to Iowa to meet with a farmer. "I want to get these soybeans in the ground. I want to plant and we want to plan," the farmer says. "The thing about the tariffs, it's hard to plan when they're out there looming," he adds. "It's amazing to look at this now and then come back in August," he says.
